appointments.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
appointments.cancelledSuccess: Your appointment has been successfully cancelled. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
appointments.cancellationPolicyText: Please note that cancelling appointments with less than 24 hours notice may incur a cancellation fee. Contact your therapist directly for more information.
appointments.confirmCancelQuestion: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment? This action cannot be undone.

bookingUrl.shareDescription: Share these links with patients to view your profile and book appointments:
bookingUrl.tipText: Share these links via email, social media, or add them to your website to let patients learn about you and book appointments.

bookingUrl.failedToFetchFallback: Failed to fetch booking URL. Using fallback.

bookingConfirmation.subject: Your Appointment is Confirmed!
bookingConfirmation.body: This is a confirmation that your appointment with {{therapistName}} is scheduled for {{bookingDate}} at {{bookingTime}}.
bookingConfirmation.rescheduleExplanation: If you need to reschedule your appointment, please cancel this appointment and book a new one.
bookingConfirmation.cancellationPolicy: Please note that an appointment needs to be canceled at least 24 hours before. If not there might be cost consequences.

bookingConfirmationTherapist.subject: New Booking with {{patientName}}
bookingConfirmationTherapist.body: You have a new booking with {{patientName}} for {{bookingDate}} at {{bookingTime}}.

appointmentReminder.subject: Reminder: Your Appointment is Tomorrow
appointmentReminder.body: This is a reminder that your appointment with {{therapistName}} is tomorrow at {{bookingTime}}.

appointmentReminderTherapist.subject: Reminder: Appointment with {{patientName}} Tomorrow
appointmentReminderTherapist.body: This is a reminder that you have an appointment with {{patientName}} tomorrow at {{bookingTime}}.

cancellationNotification.subject: An Appointment has been Cancelled
cancellationNotification.body: The appointment between {{therapistName}} and {{patientName}} on {{bookingDate}} at {{bookingTime}} has been cancelled.

rescheduleNotification.subject: An Appointment has been Rescheduled
rescheduleNotification.body: The appointment between {{therapistName}} and {{patientName}} has been rescheduled to {{newBookingDate}} at {{newBookingTime}}.
